title:
I just learned a friend died in July 2012 in Bruns. Cty.  Is there any way to see if his obit appeared in local newspaper?  Star-News online obits allow us to go back only 3 days.



Thanks.
text:
Go to this address and search for the person by name

http://www.legacy.com/obituaries/starnewsonline/

The search box is in the upper-right corner. You can go back at least
a year.
